alert.note: Alert for Bayfield; Douglas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 02 at 9:19AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...BRIEF HEAVY SNOW THIS MORNING... A band of heavy snow will move eastward across Douglas and Bayfield counties this morning. Expect visibility to drop to less than one-quarter mile for up to half an hour as the band passes. Affected locations will see rapidly changing weather and road conditions. A quick snow accumulation of up to half an inch is possible. Some locations affected through 1130 AM include Solon Springs, Maple, Brule, Iron River, and Port Wing. This includes Wisconsin portions of Highway 2, Highway 53, and Highway 63, and Wisconsin Highways 13, 27, and 35. If you are traveling and encounter adverse winter driving conditions, reduce speed and make sure headlights are on.
